product_name: Rossignol X5 OT Cross-Country Ski Boots - Men's
long_description: The Rossignol X5 OT off-track touring boots offer comfort and warmth for recreational cross-country skiers who like to explore on and off the trail. Thinsulate(TM) polyester/thermo-moldable foam insulation supplies non-bulky warmth and comfort even when damp; after a few days of skiing the foam molds to your feet. Hinged cuffs with rip-and-stick power straps provide torsional stability and control without hindering movement. Reinforced toe boxes, midsoles and heel counters deliver increased support, stability and durability for exploring on- and off-trail. Medial and lateral webbing reinforcements integrated into the boots' lacing system securely wrap the feet and lock down heels and insteps, maximizing support and control. External cuff gaiters help keep snow from getting inside the boots. Snow and ice rolls off the durable Cordura(R) lace covers of the Rossignol X5 OT boots and helps keep feet warmer.
short_description: The Rossignol X5 OT off-track touring boots offer comfort and warmth for recreational cross-country skiers who like to explore on and off the trail.
